Name: Aby's Playground
About the game: Aby's Playground is a playground where Aby tries things. You can roam the open world. There are six different bioms. You can explore all bioms and meanwhile you can find different monuments, statues and scapes. Every bioms has its own monsters. Every monster has different power. Maybe you can find bosses if you lucky. There are various weapons all over the map. You can find a sword stucked in a stone, under a flying rock, on the head of a dead giant turtle. You can use many various weapons. You can increase the speed, health, stamina of your character or unlock new spells with the points you earn by killing monsters. Don't forget, more dangerous monster means more points.
